@tmnothing yeah i know, ended up being comodo. comodo has seperate dep settings, im on xp sp3 and didnt think of it being the problem since xp doesnt have dep, but anyone else with it enabled will probably run into this. i ended up doing a clean boot and when that didnt help i knew it was comodo as every other service was disabled. sorry for clogging up the comment section

Fuckin* buggy pirate bay

1.Run eam alongside with mw2(while you have the lv you want obviously)
2.minimize the game and press export on eam
3.Update the game and run it again alongside with eam
4.minimize the game and press import on eam and that's it(at this step,if you get unrecognized version error just use the old crack for mw2)

http://www.upload.ee/files/687687/EAM.zip.html

1.Run eam alongside with mw2(while you have the lv you want obviously)
2.minimize the game and press export on eam
3.Update the game and run it again alongside with eam
4.minimize the game and press import on eam and that's it(at this step,if you get unrecognized version error just use the old crack for mw2)
